Klasse CheckoutSystem

java.lang.Object
CheckoutSystem
public class CheckoutSystem extends Object
The class checkout system can collect bought items on a receipt, print the current receipt. Furthermore, the system can analyze all sold items based on category.
Version:
1.0
Autor:
Anonymous Intern

  • Methodenübersicht

    Modifizierer und Typ
    Methode
    Beschreibung
    void
    addItemToReceipt(String item, Category category, double price)
    This method enables adding a new entry to the recept consisting of item description, category and price.
    void
    printReceipt()
    This method is to be called when all items are collected and the receipt shell be printed.
    void
    printSellingStatistics()
    This method provides an analysis of all sales with respect to: Sold items Number of sold items per category Income per category

  • Methodendetails

    • addItemToReceipt

      public void addItemToReceipt(String item, Category category, double price)
      This method enables adding a new entry to the recept consisting of item description, category and price.
      Parameter:
      item - - item description
      category - - category of added item
      price - - price of item

    • printReceipt

      public void printReceipt()
      This method is to be called when all items are collected and the receipt shell be printed.

    • printSellingStatistics

      public void printSellingStatistics()
      This method provides an analysis of all sales with respect to:
      • Sold items
      • Number of sold items per category
      • Income per category
